description.value:
[Addictive] For 1 Hour character gains +30 to Agility, Perception, Strength, and Toughness Tests. Those Addicted to the drug do not gain Fatigue from Withdrawal, instead gaining 1d5 Corruption every day until taking their next dose.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -10 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
